DOC.detailed_description: Female low urinary tract dysfunction include stress urinary incontinence , overactive bladder syndrome void dysfunction . There lot bladder study , research bladder wall thickness bladder volume . However , study urethra female patient low urinary tract symptom ( LUTS ) , especially storage disorder . Thus , main purpose study get urethra pelvic sonographic image 4D ultrasound examination , correlate sonographic finding urodynamic variable , pad weight LUTS . The investigator hope identify important LUTS sonographic biomarkers use primary physician tool assess female LUTS , thus decrease need invasive urodynamic study . Besides , association blood flow vagina/urethra sexual dysfunction ( assessed female sexual function index ) explore . In addition , woman receive antimuscarinics treatment receive follow-up 4D image request complete questionnaire 12 week later .
